comments.author: hungarian.luddite@gmail.com
comments.creator: hungarian.luddite@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.1) Gecko/20060111 Firefox/1.5.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.1) Gecko/20060111 Firefox/1.5.0.1

When attempting to lgin in to check my online mail at gmail.com Firefox crashes and returns a fatal error in the js3250.dll This used to be an intermittent problem. I can now reproduce it each time.  I also have this problem periodically on other websites. The crash is always related to the js3250.dll.  I am using the latest releasr version of FireFox and Java.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.open browswer
2.go to website
3.log in
4.crash

Actual Results:  
Firefox returns a fatal error in the js3250.dll and is rwquired to close

Expected Results:  
logged in to the gmail website

Does it also happen in Firefox's safe-mode / with a new profile?

comments.text: It does not happen when I use "safe Mode"  It seems that the login is successful but the crash and error occurs when gmail attempts to load its page.

comments.raw_text:
I sould have added the following (I am sorry)

I have the following extensions installed:

roboform 6.6.4
colorful tabs 0.3
Tabmix plus 0.3.0.5
Customize google 0.44
Flashgot 0.5.9.993

The Java version is 1.5.0_06

Thank you

comments.raw_text: Try updating your extensions. If it still happens try disabling the extensions one by one to find the culprit. And tell the extension author about the problem so he can improve the extension.
comments.text: Try updating your extensions. If it still happens try disabling the extensions one by one to find the culprit. And tell the extension author about the problem so he can improve the extension.
comments.creator: ria.klaassen@gmail.com
comments.author: ria.klaassen@gmail.com

comments.creator: hungarian.luddite@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
It was the customize google 0.44 extension that was causing the problem. WIth this extension disabled gmail loads fine and there is no crash.

Thank you
